text: Daddy was real gentle with kids. That's why I expected so much out of marriage, figuring that all men should be steady and pleasant.
author: Loretta Lynn

text: When men attempt bold gestures, generally it's considered romantic. When women do it, it's often considered desperate or psycho.
author: Sarah Jessica Parker

text: Study strategy over the years and achieve the spirit of the warrior. Today is victory over yourself of yesterday tomorrow is your victory over lesser men.
author: Miyamoto Musashi

text: It is a melancholy truth that even great men have their poor relations.
author: Charles Dickens

text: Men take only their needs into consideration - never their abilities.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte
